## noop(gulp, params)

A Sharable task that does nothing.

When executed completes with a resolved promise.

### Parameters

-   `gulp`  
-   `params`  

Returns **[function][1]** Gulp tasks

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function
